below_are_your_invoice: Below are your invoice or receipt detail in summary
please_fill_in_the_required_personal: Please fill in the required personal or business detail
to_facilitate_the_issuance: To facilitate the issuance of e-invoices, it is essential for us to gather comprehensive information in line with the guidelines set forth by the Inland Revenue Board of Malaysia (IRBM). We want to assure you that we dedicated to safeguarding your personal information and upholding your privacy.
i_acknowledge_that_all_the_info: I acknowledge that all the information provided is accurate and complete.
will_not_be_held_responsible_for_any_fai: will not be heldresponsible for any failure of e-invoice requests submitted after the cut-off time due to incomplete or incorrect information.
einvoice_will_be_available_for: e-invoice will be available for download once it has been successfully validated.
your_transaction_has_been_successfully: Your transaction has been successfully validated by LHDN. You can now proceed to download your e-invoice.
we_encountered_an_issue: We encountered an issue with your e-invoice submission. Please review the details you provided and try submitting again.
